item.title: AAAI21 Papers
item.description: Name Link Robust Reinforcement Learning: A Case Study in Linear Quadratic Regulation https://arxiv.org/pdf/2008.11592 Self-Supervised Attention-Aware Reinforcement Learning https://www.aaai.org/AAAI21Papers/AAAI-1137.WuH.pdf Hierarchical Reinforcement Learning for Integrated Recommendation Reinforced History Backtracking for Conversational Question Answering https://www.aaai.org/AAAI21Papers/AAAI-1260.QiuM.pdf Combining Reinforcement Learning with Lin-Kernighan-Helsgaun Algorithm for the Traveling Salesman Problem https://arxiv.org/pdf/2012.04461 Learning to Reweight Imaginary Transitions for Model-Based Reinforcement Learning Advice-Guided Reinforcement Learning in a Non-Markovian Environment https://people.

item.title: AAAI20 Papers
item.description: Name Link Reinforcing an Image Caption Generator Using Off-Line Human Feedback https://arxiv.org/pdf/1911.09753 Reinforcement Learning of Risk-Constrained Policies in Markov Decision Processes https://ojs.aaai.org/index.php/AAAI/article/view/6531/6387 Deep Model-Based Reinforcement Learning via Estimated Uncertainty and Conservative Policy Optimization https://ojs.aaai.org/index.php/AAAI/article/download/6177/6033 Reinforcement Learning with Non-Markovian Rewards https://ojs.aaai.org/index.php/AAAI/article/download/5814/5670 Hierarchical Reinforcement Learning for Open-Domain Dialog https://ojs.aaai.org/index.php/AAAI/article/download/6400/6256 Copy or Rewrite: Hybrid Summarization with Hierarchical Reinforcement Learning https://ojs.
